tool_description: Introducing  SynthLingua API a cutting-edge language processing tool fueled by advanced AI algorithms. Seamlessly detect the language of any text, obtain language codes, and transcend language barriers with TransLingualizer and RewordMaster, powered by state-of-the-art artificial intelligence. Immerse your content in the charm of Victorian prose using VictorianWhisper, all made possible by our AI-driven language transformation. Uncover the core themes of any text effortlessly with MetaTopic E...
name: SynthLingua API
title: SynthLingua API

api_list.name: Get topics
api_list.description: extract the main topic of a given text

api_list.name: Get text by a Victorian writer
api_list.description: rewrite your text as a victorian writer

api_list.name: Get Rewrited
api_list.description: rewrite the given text keeping the meaning

api_list.name: Get translation
api_list.description:
translate the given text, to a select language
text = given text
to  = language that you want the translation

api_list.name: Detect Language
api_list.description: end point to detect what is the language of the text; return the language code
